docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: FOR MILLIONS OF ALLERGY sufferers, the balmy breezes of spring herald the seasons of misery. But a recent flowering of medical research has ushered in a new season in the battle against hay fever and asthma. ''Our capacity to treat these diseases is night-and-day better because we have a marked increase in our knowledge of what goes on inside the nose and airways,'' says Dr.
